sentences.sContent: Both light and dark work together to create amalgamation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both light and dark work together to create amalgamation.
sentences.sCn: 光明和黑暗一起工作来创造融合。

sentences.sContent: This shift includes an amalgamation of light and dark again in earth's field.
sentences.sContent_eng: This shift includes an amalgamation of light and dark again in earth's field.
sentences.sCn: 这一变迁包括在地球的能量场中再次融合光明与黑暗。

sentences.sContent: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.sCn: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

synos.tran: 融合，混合；合并，联合；混汞法，[冶]汞齐化法

words.tran: [材] 汞合金，[化工] 汞齐；混合物
合并；汞齐化；调制汞合金
合并；使（金属）汞齐化；混合
